transcript:
there's basically three things that you
should stop doing immediately if you
want to be happier number one you have
to stop regretting the past there's
nothing you can do about it don't forget
the past you can learn from it and get
better from it so you don't make the
same mistakes but you got to stop
regretting the past number two is stop
worrying about the future psychologists
have found that 85% of what you worry
about on a daily basis will never happen
that's a waste of your energy that's a
waste of your time and number three stop
looking for your happiness in other
people other people cannot make you
happy it is absolutely impossible
happiness is 100% an inside job
